title.rendered: Official Vaal University of Technology Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Vaal University of Technology consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Vaal University of Technology admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Vaal University of Technology based on the information provided within it.

Note: Vaal University of Technology’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Vaal University of Technology Prospectus 2024

The Vaal University of Technology   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.vut.ac.za/.

Vaal University of Technology PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
